actions: Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine, benefits the marrow and tonifies the Kidneys and Liver.
Removes Wind, eliminates Dampness and invigorates the Blood.
Promotes the movement of Qi and invigorates the Blood, opens the Middle Jiao and unblocks the channels.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin and benefits Jing.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and clears Deficiency Heat.
Nourishes and tonifies the Liver and Kidney Yin and clears Deficiency Heat.
With Nu Zhen Zi, for severe Liver and Kidney Yin Deficiency with ascendant Yang.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat and soothes irritability.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and increases the libido.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and regulates Qi flow.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and clears Liver Fire.

syndromes: Liver Qi Stagnation with Kidney Deficiency

symptoms: Soreness and weakness of the knees and legs
manifestations.pulse: Deep and maybe thready and wiry
